name: Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal
text:
3 "Etherym" monsters
This Fusion Summoned monster is unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects. You can only use each of the following effects of "Oroborascion, Etherym of Time Eternal" once per turn. When your opponent would summon a monster (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 monster you control or from your GY; negate the Summon, and if you do, banish that monster. If this monster is banished: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; banish it.
